backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control setup, and data structures for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, and activity tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence reports listing feature requirements, associated files, components, and testing identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend files, describing layouts, pages, and components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router configuration, routes, and global theme/toaster providers for the React app.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Renders a bookmark toggle button using bookmark state and styling based on active/inactive status.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Displays a comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Shows interactive emoji reaction buttons with hover effects, counts, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with navigation links and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, search (desktop and mobile), user avatar, and responsive behaviors including dropdowns and modals.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header, footer, main outlet, and manages the mobile sidebar drawer state on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Provides the left navigation sidebar with links and recent activity, highlighting active routes and supporting mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post card with avatar, metadata, image, and interactive actions such as likes, shares, and bookmarks.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders an image with automatic aspect ratio handling and a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide‑in mobile sidebar drawer with scrim overlay and scroll‑locking behavior.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, moderators, stats, and join/leave controls with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders the mobile header for a pond, including banner, profile image, description, and feed/about tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post card with voting, metadata, optional image, tag, and comment/view counts, linking to pond and post pages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit activity with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, content, and a link to view the conversation.
Provides a popover emoji picker that calls a callback when an emoji is selected.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit with avatar, timestamp, like/unlike logic, replies, and an optional reply form with depth-based indentation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads avatar images with a tiny blurred placeholder and transitions to the final image once loaded, supporting avatar or plain img modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent high‑view posts using data from queries with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: A mobile search modal that shows trending searches and suggestions, handles input, selection, and submission, and displays results in a scrollable overlay.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: A desktop dropdown component that displays trending searches or suggestions based on the query and lets users select a term.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags using a modular stats component with loading states and tag links.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab lists and tab triggers with underline-focused styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs using localStorage with functions to toggle and retrieve bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query currently matches using matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, posts, lilies, user data, and search suggestions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus utility classes for UI behaviors.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short k/M/B notation with one decimal precision.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates, detects animation, resizes, and compresses images client-side with fallbacks and format adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides alphanumeric pond name validation, normalization, and error messaging.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using Web Share API with clipboard-based fallbacks and user notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user-friendly errors for invalid tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages username, user ID, Froggy Phrase, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per-lily view cooldown timestamps in localStorage to limit view increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the Ribbit about page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with join status, loading states, and navigation to pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including pond selection, tag suggestions, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: UI for creating a new pond with name validation, descriptions, and compressed banner and profile images.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Page to create text, image, or link posts with pond selection, optional tag, and image compression before submission.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing avatar, basic stats, and tabs for posts and comments fetched by username.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing trending or new lilies, supporting search results and responsive sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a lily post with comments, handles view increments, likes, and creating ribbits.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond info including description, moderators, membership status, and leave-pond action.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays the main pond feed with lilies, join-pond controls, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Renders a single post with its details, image, link, and threaded comments plus comment creation.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with options to remove or view them.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with stats and navigation to each tag's page.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Renders a tag page that loads canonical tags and associated lilies, handles redirects, and supports sorting with tabs.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Implements a complex user settings interface including username changes, avatar upload/compression, froggy phrase management, pond membership, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes current project status, issues, and feature requests focused on restoring the frontend and implementing avatar upload functionality.
